Kath Pringle is Kath May Music

Singer & Pianist

Weddings | Functions | Corporate Events

Nelson's Own Stevie Nicks and Fleetwood Mac Songstress!

Biography

Kath Pringle, born and raised in Nelson, is no stranger to the Nelson music scene. In the late 1990's, early 2000's Kath was part of the musical duo, 2 Tribes, performing at weddings, corporate events and local pubs. With captivating vocals, Kath brings the timeless beauty of Stevie Nicks and Fleetwood Mac to life in intimate performances that will enthrall audiences. This exclusive collection features Kath's enchanting renditions of Stevie Nicks most beloved songs from Rhiannon to Landslide. Her performances are a must see experience for fans of the legendary band.
Join Kath on journey through the music that has inspired generations and book Kath of your upcoming wedding, birthday party or corporate function.
Performance times vary to suit the individual and range from one song to a two and half hour set.

Contact Kath Today!
